oai_dc:dc.dc:title: COMBINED REFRACTION-DIFFRACTION CALCULATIONS WITH DIRECTIONAL WAVE SPECTRA
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gaillard, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wave spectra
wave direction
directional spectra
refraction
diffraction
combined refraction-diffraction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A method of calculation of the combined effects of wave refraction, diffraction and reflection in harbours of arbitrary shape and non uniform water depth, subject to periodic or random waves is presented. Examples of application are given and practical aspects on the wave spectrum discretisation are considered.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 19 (1984): Proceedings of 19th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Houston, Texas, 1984.; 71
